comments.body:
@bethaitman-da: I found a protobuf documentation page hosted by google, eg. for google.rpc.Status: https://cloud.google.com/tasks/docs/reference/rpc/google.rpc#google.rpc.Status
Since we already link to developers.google.com, I assume this is okay as well?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@sed -r "$re" -i docs_rst_mmd.md
# Fix links to external google rpc documentation
re='s,:ref:`(\.?google\.rpc\.[^<>`\n]*) <(.*)>`, [\1](https://cloud.google.com/tasks/docs/reference/rpc/google.rpc#\2),g'
sed -r "$re" -i docs_rst_mmd.md
# Fix paragraph breaks within tables (perl because of multi-line feature)
